description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Game, Set & Match! Experience the most spectacular matches with Avatar Tennis! Train your skills, unlock over 50 rackets and get to the top rankings in the complete Career Mode, and take part in exciting local games of up to 4 players.
